description: Behaviors that trigger based on player or object proximity

exploder.name: Exploder
exploder.description: Creates an object that self-destructs when the player enters its detection range, causing damage to both player and nearby entities.

properties.name: DETECTION_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the explosion is triggered

properties.name: DAMAGE
properties.description: Amount of damage dealt to player and nearby entities

steps: Create an object to be used as the exploder
Set the object's Explode property to ON

proximity_mine.name: Proximity Mine
proximity_mine.description: A landmine that detonates when a player or NPC is in range. Can be disarmed with the E key when close. Features customizable detection range and detonation countdown.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the mine will detect entities

properties.name: DETONATION_TIME
properties.description: Milliseconds between detection and explosion

proximity_sensor.name: Proximity Sensor
proximity_sensor.description: Creates a proximity range sensor that can detect NPCs and/or players to activate logic-linked entities or perform selected actions. Features customizable detection range, entity filtering, and multiple action types.

properties.name: SENSOR_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the sensor will detect entities

properties.name: SENSED_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when an entity is detected

properties.name: SENSE_PLAYER
properties.description: Whether to detect the player

properties.name: SENSE_NPC
properties.description: Whether to detect NPCs

properties.name: NPC_TYPE
properties.description: Type of NPC to detect

properties.name: ACTION_TYPE
properties.description: Action to perform when triggered

properties.name: ACTION_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount to apply for the selected action

properties.name: ACTIVATED
properties.description: Whether the sensor is active by default (if unchecked, requires switch/zone activation)

proximity_sensor.name: Proximity Sensor
proximity_sensor.description: Creates a proximity range sensor that detects NPCs and/or players within a specified range. Features configurable detection types, action responses, and logic connections. Perfect for creating security systems, automatic doors, and reactive environments.

properties.name: SENSOR_RANGE
properties.description: Detection range of the proximity sensor in units

properties.name: SENSED_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the sensor detects a target

properties.name: SENSE_PLAYER
properties.description: Whether to detect the player within sensor range

properties.name: SENSE_NPC
properties.description: Whether to detect NPCs within sensor range

properties.name: NPC_TYPE
properties.description: Type of NPC to detect (Enemy = hostile, Ally = friendly, Neutral = neutral, Object = any object)

properties.name: ACTION_TYPE
properties.description: Action to perform when target is detected (None = no action, Damage = damage target, Self Destruct = destroy sensor, Object Repel = push target away)

properties.name: ACTION_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of damage or force to apply when action is triggered

properties.name: ACTIVATED
properties.description: Whether sensor is always active (No = requires switch or zone activation)

features: Configurable detection range up to 2000 units
Multiple NPC type filtering (Enemy, Ally, Neutral, Object)
Four action types (None, Damage, Self Destruct, Object Repel)
Flat distance calculation for accurate detection
Compatible with trigger zones and switches

steps: Configure detection range and target types
Set up action type and amount
Set up logic connections for detected events
Adjust range and action settings as needed

range_sensor.name: Range Sensor
range_sensor.description: Creates a range sensor that detects when the player enters a specified area. Features two trigger modes for logic connections or video playback with level changes. Perfect for creating level transitions, cutscenes, and area-based triggers.

properties.name: SENSOR_RANGE
properties.description: Detection range of the sensor in units

properties.name: SENSED_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when the sensor detects the player

properties.name: TRIGGER_MODE
properties.description: Action to perform when player is detected (Linked = trigger logic connections, Video+ChangeLevel = play video then change level)

properties.name: VIDEO_SKIP
properties.description: Whether players can skip the video (only used in Video+ChangeLevel mode)

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: How to handle level changes (Use Storyboard Logic = next level in storyboard, Go to Specific Level = specific level)

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering the new level

features: Configurable detection range up to 10000 units
Two trigger modes for different use cases
Automatic reset when player leaves range

steps: Configure detection range and trigger mode
Set up video settings if using Video+ChangeLevel mode
Set up video slot with your video file
Configure logic connections for Linked mode
Verify level transitions and video playback
